messages.subject: Kondou humor and Saitou Family tree (English) Uploaded
messages.msgSnippet: Behold!! At long last!! (and all that) I have uploaded my translation of Saitou s family tree to the Photos section! Of course, there are some names missing,
messages.messageBody:
Behold!! At long last!! (and all that)

I have uploaded my translation of Saitou's family tree to
the "Photos" section! Of course, there are some names missing, but
those are the only ones that I wasn't able to read the kanji of
(since they were a bit difficult to decipher).

Also, I've uploaded "The Many Moods of Kondou Isami" into the Humor
section of "Photos". Check it out! (hehe...)

--M.
